newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: St George says Neil Berkett to leave.
newsitem.headline: St George says Neil Berkett to leave.

text.p: St George Bank Ltd said on Tuesday that Neil Burkett, the executive in charge of the integration of Advance Bank, would leave the company later this year.
The regional bank, the fifth largest bank in Australia, said Berkett would pursue career opportunities in the United Kingdom.

St George managing director Jim Sweeney said Berkett, who was head of the retail operations before the A$2.6 billion takeover of Advance late last year, had advised the board in late 1996 of his plan to move to the U.K.

"He agreed to stay on until late 1997 to manage the merger integration process through its critical early stages. Mr Berkett and the board also agreed at that time that his intention to depart would be kept confidential until later in the merger process," Sweeney said.
Berkett was expected to leave once the integration functions have been taken on by managers, expected in October.
